alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Harnett; Hoke; Moore (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 10:01PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Moore, southwestern Harnett, northwestern Cumberland and northern Hoke Counties through 1100 PM EDT... At 959 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of developing, strong thunderstorms from Southern Pines to near and just north of Pope AFB to Timberlake, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Southern Pines, Fort Bragg, Aberdeen, Pope AFB, Spring Lake, Vass, Linden, Pineview and Anderson Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
